item.title: Allegedly intoxicated Southwest Airlines pilot arrested at airport ahead of flight
item.description: Southwest Airlines confirmed the pilot had been removed from duty and apologized to customers whose travel plans were disrupted.

item.title: Altadena family recounts their harrowing escape from Eaton Fire
item.description: The Taylor family reflects on their evacuation from the Eaton Fire and discusses the loss of their home in Altadena.

item.title: Woman wins jackpot from lotto ticket she 'stole' in Christmas gift exchange
item.description: Emily Hickox, an Indiana woman, won $500,000 after playing a Michigan Lottery instant game ticket.

item.title: 4-year-old girl found safe after vehicle stolen with her in back seat: Police
item.description: Four-year-old Blessing Aoci was in the back seat of a vehicle when it was stolen early Thursday morning in Rock Island, Illinois, police said.

item.title: LA wildfire victims: What we know about those killed
item.description: Family members have begun to identify the residents who were killed in the devastating wildfires in the Los Angeles area.
